documentation.author: CERNER
documentation.purpose: Create appropriate responses for statin not prescribed and goal clinical events based on documented allergy to statin medication.
documentation.explanation: STK 6 is a Core Measure related to statin medication prescribed at discharge for stroke patients, including evaluation of why a statin medication might not be prescribed.
documentation.query: 7/6/11 - Added script nhqm_get_ce_coded_results 8-29-11 - updated dta Reg Reason Statin Not Given Disch vC 9/26/11 - added evoke on Quality measures Dashboard initiated 10/4/11 - changed evoke on Quality measures dashboard initiated to look at both Ordered and Completed statuses 10/6/11 - modified logic section to handle QM dashboard initiated evoke 10/11/11 - updated purpose and explanation to match requirements 10/12/11 - Added pitavastatin to the meds lists
documentation.impact:
The following needs to be addressed at each client site:
All order details need to be reinstantiated
All scripts need to be included in any environment that this rule is to run in
ALL ACTIONS
VALUE1 needs to be reinstantiated
documentation.keywords: Powerform QM STK 2 3 6 Discharge Medications v3 1 Stroke Quality Measures PowerPlan 1 Statins

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_E
templateDefinitions.definition: Allergy action is ACTION_TYPE and allergy ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: An allergy exists that ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_PARAM_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a dynamic parameter named PARAMNAME with a value of PARAMVALUE. And OPT_SUBSTITUTION resolve substitution value.
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a dynamic parameter to be used by subsequent templates.

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))
select param_value ="Double click in lower box to enter a freetext value, or right click and paste values that have been copied", _hidden = " " from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Allergy action is ACTION_TYPE and allergy ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

values.value: Allergy to or complication related to statins
Allergy to or complication related to statins
Reg STK Reason Statin Not Given Disch vC
Reg STK Reason Statin Not Given Disch vC
Reg STK Statin Prescribed at Discharge
Reg STK Doc Statin Not Given Disch
Reg Discharged on Statin Medication Goal
